title: Choosing Forever
description: Life is made up of choices. Single choices like bricks laid out in a path. A path that leads to your future. At twenty four years old, I would have never guessed I would be stuck between two menâ€”two men from opposite spectrums of the universe.Their lives, their worlds, their demeanor is as different as the darkest of nights and the lightest of days.I love them both, but I have to choose.There is only one choice I can make.And I choose forever.Releasing February 13, 2017.
author: Mia Kayla
